pages.title: Item Rarity
pages.text: All materials and gear have $(key)rarities$(). From low to high: $(bold)Common$(), $(bold)Uncommon$(), $(bold)Rare$(), $(bold)Epic$(), and $(bold)Legendary$().$(br2)$(welcome/emi#search)Search$() tags (starting with $(bold)#$()) to view related items.$(br2)Search keywords for each rarity:

$(br2)If you want to search for $(bold)weapons$(), $(bold)armor$(), or $(t:includes both weapons and gear)$(bold)gear$(), replace the keyword above as follows:$(br)$(list)Weapons: material -> $(copy:weapon)weapon$()$(br)$(list)Armor: material -> $(copy:armor)armor$()$(br)$(list)Gear: material -> $(copy:gear)gear$()

$(br2)If the keywords feel too long, you can type only part of them.$(br2)For example:$(br2)$(copy:#spell-dimension:epic/armor)#spell-dimension:epic/armor$() can be shortened to $(copy:#epic/armor)#epic/armor$() with the same result.$(br2)Just remember: $(bold)don't omit the leading #$().
